# Charles Ward (Irish politician)

Charles Ward (born 2 July 1977) is an Irish politician from the 100% Redress party who has been a Teachta DÃ¡la (TD) for the Donegal constituency since the 2024 general election.
Ward has a career in healthcare. He was an unsuccessful candidate at the 2024 Donegal County Council election.
Personal life
Ward was born in Aranmore Island, County Donegal. It was there that he met his wife Angela. They have been living in Drumkeen, County Donegal, for the past twenty years, and have four children. He spent many years in Scotland.
